incidents.name: 5xx's from Programmable Messaging API

incident_updates.body: The Twilio Programmable Messaging API was partially degraded for 1 minute on May 26, 2025 between 16:05 PST and 16:06 PST. During this period of time, customers may have received elevated volumes of 5xx's in API responses. This issue has now been resolved.

The Twilio Programmable Messaging API was partially degraded for 1 minute on May 26, 2025 between 16:05 PST and 16:06 PST. During this period of time, customers may have received elevated volumes of 5xx's in API responses.
